Math.h

00001 #ifndef _LANG_MATH_H
00002 #define _LANG_MATH_H
00003 
00004 
00005 #include <lang/pp.h>
00006 #include <xmath.h>
00007 
00008 
00009 // Make sure there is no defines around
00010 #undef E
00011 #undef PI
00012 #undef abs
00013 #undef max
00014 #undef min
00015 
00016 
00017 BEGIN_NAMESPACE(lang) 
00018 
00019 
00020 
00025 class Math
00026 {
00027 public:
00032     static const float E;
00033 
00038     static const float PI;
00039 
00041     template <class T>
00042     static T        abs( T x )                  {return x < T(0) ? -x : x;}
00043 
00045     template <class T>
00046     static T        min( T a, T b )             {return b < a ? b : a;}
00047 
00049     template <class T>
00050     static T        max( T a, T b )             {return a < b ? b : a;}
00051 
00053     static float    random();
00054     
00056     static int      round( float x )            {return (int)::floorf(x+.5f);}
00057 
00059     static float    acos( float x )             {return ::acosf(x);}
00060 
00062     static float    asin( float x )             {return ::asinf(x);}
00063 
00065     static float    atan( float x )             {return ::atanf(x);}
00066 
00068     static float    atan2( float x, float y )   {return ::atan2f(x,y);}
00069 
00071     static float    ceil( float x )             {return ::ceilf(x);}
00072 
00074     static float    cos( float x )              {return ::cosf(x);}
00075 
00077     static float    exp( float x )              {return ::expf(x);}
00078 
00080     static float    floor( float x )            {return ::floorf(x);}
00081 
00083     static float    log( float x )              {return ::logf(x);}
00084 
00086     static float    pow( float x, float y )     {return ::powf(x,y);}
00087 
00089     static float    rint( float x )             {return ::floorf(x+.5f);}
00090 
00092     static float    sin( float x )              {return ::sinf(x);}
00093 
00095     static float    sqrt( float x )             {return ::sqrtf(x);}
00096 
00098     static float    tan( float x )              {return ::tanf(x);}
00099 
00101     static float    toDegrees( float radians )  {return radians * 57.29577951308232f;}
00102 
00104     static float    toRadians( float degrees )  {return degrees * 0.017453292519943295f;}
00105 
00106 private:
00107     Math();
00108     Math( const Math& );
00109     Math& operator=( const Math& );
00110 };
